title: Diff eq.: No context, with d2y/dx2 part - c

content.question: Let y=f(x) be a particular solution to the differential equation with the initial condition f(0)=1. Does f have a relative minimum, a relative maximum, or neither at x=0? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Let y=f(x) be a particular solution to the differential equation with the initial condition f(0)=1. Does f have a relative minimum, a relative maximum, or neither at x=0? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.7: Using the Second Derivative Test to Determine Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
